channel.title: Need a Client that will handle this
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I was wondering if anybody knew of a good client to use to get the source I am using to make a "Practice Server" I am using Vyrescape's source and I have tried their client and it got stuck at 1% loading, Tried using another client (Zenith) But same thing, Got stuck at 1%. Do you think it might be my source? or do I need a client that would handle a 726?
P.S. I am not using these servers to make money or even portforward them, I am using them as practice to help me make my own server.
Thanks, Mike
